Methods

CartesianToSphericalCoordinates(points[, ceval])
param points: a pointset containing the points to transform to spherical :param ceval: backend to use: - eval: pure Numpy - numexpr.evaluate (default): Numexpr (faster for large arrays)
cart2sph_RDD(points, sc) Cartesian to spherical transformation via RDD.

static CartesianToSphericalCoordinates(points, ceval=<function evaluate>)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • points – a pointset containing the points to transform to spherical
  • ceval – backend to use: - eval: pure Numpy - numexpr.evaluate (default): Numexpr (faster for large arrays)
Returns:

spherical coordinates property in degrees
Return type:

SphericalCoordinatesProperty

cart2sph_RDD(points, sc)[source]¶

Cartesian to spherical transformation via RDD.

Parameters:
  • points (PointSet) – a point set to be transformed
  • sc – a spark context object (driver) that will run the job

:type SparkContext

Returns: RDD holding the spherical coordinates
Return type: pySpark RDD
